page.title: 18FARM LIFE (page 2)
page.content: We have an orchard and it requires pruning,spraying etc My father keeps hives of bees in the orchard for they help pollinate the apple-blossom.I help mother make "candy" for them in winter and syrup in spring.Bees are very interesting to observe - and I like the honey,too! During summer and harvest-time we can earn pocket-money helping with hay, picking fruit,gardening,pulling apples etc.In autumn,too,I pick blackberries for my mother to make jam. When I am free in the evenings I can go to the local Youth Club to play snooker,table tennis,badminton or darts or to the Young Farmers' Club.Mum and Dad can play bowls or badminton in the evenings. We help with many jobs around the farm,and when I do my school-work as well,I am really busy!
